snippet: The University of Montana and the University of Wisconsin play a similar style of basketball, a fact that gives the Grizzlies confidence in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
abstract: The University of Montana and the University of Wisconsin play a similar style of basketball, a fact that gives the Grizzlies confidence in the N.C.A.A. tournament.

headline.main: The View from Montana: An Upset of Wisconsin Would Come as No Surprise
